metadata.title: NBA CBA Study Materials - Batch 15: Article XIII - Assignments (Contract Assignments)
metadata.importance: MEDIUM - Understanding how contracts are assigned and transferred

studyNote: Article XIII covers how player contracts are assigned from one team to another, the rights and obligations that transfer, and restrictions on assignments.

questions.question: What does 'assignment' mean in CBA terms?
options: Transfer of a player contract from one team to another
questions.explanation: Assignment refers to the transfer of a player's contract from one NBA team to another, primarily through trades.

questions.question: Can player contracts be assigned without the player's consent?
options: Yes, unless player has a no-trade clause
questions.explanation: Teams can assign (trade) player contracts without consent unless the player has negotiated a no-trade clause into their contract.

questions.question: Do all contract terms transfer when a contract is assigned?
options: No, new team can change terms
questions.explanation: When a contract is assigned, all terms including salary, bonuses, options, and other provisions transfer completely to the acquiring team.

questions.question: Can a team assign a contract to a non-NBA entity?
options: No, only to other NBA teams
questions.explanation: NBA contracts can only be assigned to other NBA teams. They cannot be assigned to G League teams, overseas leagues, or other entities.

questions.question: What obligations does the assigning team have after assignment?
options: Provide medical records to new team
questions.explanation: Once a contract is assigned, the assigning team has no further obligations. All responsibilities transfer completely to the acquiring team.

questions.question: Can draft pick rights be assigned?
options: Yes, draft picks and draft rights can be traded/assigned
questions.explanation: Draft picks and the rights to drafted players (including international players) can be assigned through trades.

questions.question: If a player has trade bonus language, does it transfer on assignment?
options: No, trade bonuses stay with original team
Yes, but new team doesn't have to honor
Trade bonuses are prohibited in NBA
questions.explanation: Trade bonuses (trade kickers) are not permitted in NBA contracts, unlike some other sports leagues.

questions.question: Can a team assign a player contract to multiple teams simultaneously?
options: No, can only assign to one team at a time
questions.explanation: In multi-team trades, a contract can be assigned through multiple teams in sequence (Team A to Team B to Team C) as part of one transaction.

questions.question: Does assigning a contract affect the player's free agency timeline?
options: No, service time and FA timeline continue unchanged
questions.explanation: Assignment does not affect a player's years of service or free agency timeline. All accrued service time continues with the new team.

questions.question: Can contract assignment be made conditional on future events?
options: No, assignments must be unconditional (except for physicals)
questions.explanation: Assignments must be unconditional except for standard physical examination requirements. Future performance or other contingencies are not allowed.

questions.question: What happens if a player fails the physical after assignment?
options: Assignment can be voided and player returns to original team
questions.explanation: If a player fails the physical exam, the acquiring team can void the assignment and the player returns to the original team with the original contract.

questions.question: Can a team assign partial rights to a player contract?
options: No, contracts must be assigned in full
Only Bird Rights can be split
questions.explanation: Player contracts must be assigned in their entirety. Teams cannot assign partial rights or split contract ownership.

questions.question: Do player options transfer when a contract is assigned?
options: Yes, all options remain in player's control
questions.explanation: Player options and team options both transfer unchanged. The player retains the right to exercise player options with the new team.

questions.question: Can a team assign the rights to an unsigned draft pick?
options: Yes, rights to drafted players can be assigned
questions.explanation: Teams can assign (trade) the NBA rights to players they've drafted but not yet signed, including international players playing overseas.

questions.question: What is required for an assignment to be valid?
questions.explanation: Assignments become valid when the trade call is completed with the league office and the league approves the transaction.

questions.question: Can teams assign contracts during a lockout?
options: No, all transactions frozen during lockout
questions.explanation: During a lockout, all player transactions including assignments are frozen until the lockout ends and a new CBA is in place.

questions.question: Does the acquiring team inherit any salary cap penalties from the assigning team?
options: No, cap penalties remain with the assigning team
questions.explanation: Salary cap penalties, luxury tax obligations, and similar team-level penalties do not transfer. Only the player contract and its terms transfer.

questions.question: Can a player request that their contract be assigned?
options: Yes, teams must honor trade requests
No, but players can request - team decides
questions.explanation: Players can request trades, but teams have no obligation to honor such requests unless the player has a no-trade clause giving them control.

questions.question: Can contracts be assigned retroactively?
options: No, assignments are effective when approved, not retroactive
questions.explanation: Assignments take effect when approved by the league, not retroactively. The player becomes property of the new team at that moment.

questions.question: What documentation is required for an assignment to be processed?
options: Written trade agreement and completed trade call with league office
questions.explanation: Assignments require written documentation of all trade terms and a completed trade call with the league office where details are verified and approved.
